description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Bangers & Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Potato
name: Spicy Bangers & Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup full cream milk, sliced ( 1/4 cup hot milk, for mash and 3/4 cup milk for recipe base)

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes in a large saucepan. Cover with cold water and lid. Bring to the boil over a high heat. Remove lid and reduce heat to medium-high. Boil, uncovered, for 30 minutes or until tender when tested with a skewer. Drain and set aside for 5 minutes.
Peel and discard the potato skins. Return peeled potatoes to the dry hot saucepan. Shake pan over low heat for 1-2 minutes to remove any remaining moisture.
Mash potatoes. Add butter and hot milk and mix with a wooden spoon until smooth. Season with salt, pepper, nutmeg and parsley. Cover and keep warm.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a medium frying pan. Add sausages and cook for 8-10 minutes, turning regularly until well browned. Remove from the pan. Slice sausages and set aside.

Add onion to the pan and cook until soft. Return sausages to the pan. Empty a Curried Sausages Recipe Base into the pan. Add milk and stir thoroughly. Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes until sauce is heated through.
Serve sausages with mashed potato and steamed green beans.
